transArray.content: Very, very excellent, the service attitude is very good, there are many choices for breakfast, the room is very clean, the intelligent equipment is very new, there is also a driver pick-up service, just call ten minutes in advance, the chef will also help deliver it to the world. I recommended a friend to stay here. The pillows are latex pillows and it feels very relaxing to sleep on. I like the front desk service attitude and the shuttle bus service!

Dear guests, thank you very much for your praise of our hotel, we will continue to do our best to live up to your praise. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel, look forward to visiting again, and wish you a pleasant journey!
